001
002package com.commercetools.api.defaultconfig;
003
004import java.net.URI;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.function.Function;
007import java.util.function.Supplier;
008import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
009
010import javax.annotation.Nullable;
011
012import com.commercetools.api.client.ApiInternalLoggerFactory;
013import com.commercetools.api.client.ApiRoot;
014import com.commercetools.api.client.ByProjectKeyRequestBuilder;
015import com.commercetools.api.client.ProjectApiRoot;
016
017import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
018import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.HttpExceptionFactory;
019import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.*;
020import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.ClientCredentials;
021import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.TokenSupplier;
022
023/**
024 * Builder to create a {@link ApiRoot} or a project scoped {@link ProjectApiRoot}
025 */
026public class ApiRootBuilder {
027    private final ClientBuilder builder;
028
029    private ApiRootBuilder(ClientBuilder builder) {
030        this.builder = builder;
031    }
032
033    public static ApiRootBuilder of() {
034        return new ApiRootBuilder(ClientBuilder.of());
035    }
036
037    public static ApiRootBuilder of(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
038        return new ApiRootBuilder(ClientBuilder.of(httpClient));
039    }
040
041    public static ApiRootBuilder of(final HandlerStack stack) {
042        return new ApiRootBuilder(ClientBuilder.of(stack));
043    }
044
045    public ApiRootBuilder withHandlerStack(final HandlerStack stack) {
046        builder.withHandlerStack(stack);
047        return this;
048    }
049
050    public ApiRootBuilder withHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
051        builder.withHttpClient(httpClient);
052        return this;
053    }
054
055    public ApiRootBuilder withSerializer(final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
056        builder.withSerializer(serializer);
057        return this;
058    }
059
060    public ApiRootBuilder withSerializer(final Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer) {
061        builder.withSerializer(serializer);
062        return this;
063    }
064
065    public ApiRootBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final HttpExceptionFactory factory) {
066        builder.withHttpExceptionFactory(factory);
067        return this;
068    }
069
070    public ApiRootBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Function<ResponseSerializer, HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
071        builder.withHttpExceptionFactory(factory);
072        return this;
073    }
074
075    public ApiRootBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
076        builder.withHttpExceptionFactory(factory);
077        return this;
078    }
079
080    public ApiRootBuilder defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials) {
081        return defaultClient(credentials, ServiceRegion.GCP_EUROPE_WEST1);
082    }
083
084    public ApiRootBuilder defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials, ServiceRegionConfig serviceRegion) {
085        return defaultClient(URI.create(serviceRegion.getApiUrl())).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials,
086            serviceRegion.getOAuthTokenUrl());
087    }
088
089    public ApiRootBuilder defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
090            final String apiEndpoint) {
091        return defaultClient(URI.create(apiEndpoint)).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
092    }
093
094    public ApiRootBuilder defaultClient(final String apiEndpoint, final ClientCredentials credentials,
095            final String tokenEndpoint) {
096        return defaultClient(URI.create(apiEndpoint)).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
097    }
098
099    public ApiRootBuilder defaultClient(final String apiEndpoint) {
100        return defaultClient(URI.create(apiEndpoint));
101    }
102
103    public ApiRootBuilder defaultClient(final URI apiEndpoint) {
104        builder.defaultClient(apiEndpoint).withInternalLoggerFactory(ApiInternalLoggerFactory::get);
105
106        return this;
107    }
108
109    public ApiRootBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
110        builder.withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
111
112        return this;
113    }
114
115    public ApiRootBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
116            final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
117        builder.withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
118
119        return this;
120    }
121
122    public ApiRootBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint) {
123        builder.withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
124
125        return this;
126    }
127
128    public ApiRootBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
129            final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
130        builder.withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
131
132        return this;
133    }
134
135    public ApiRootBuilder withStaticTokenFlow(final AuthenticationToken token) {
136        builder.withStaticTokenFlow(token);
137
138        return this;
139    }
140
141    public ApiRootBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
142        builder.withAnonymousSessionFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
143
144        return this;
145    }
146
147    public ApiRootBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
148            final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
149        builder.withAnonymousSessionFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
150
151        return this;
152    }
153
154    public ApiRootBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
155            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint) {
156        builder.withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint);
157
158        return this;
159    }
160
161    public ApiRootBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
162            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
163        builder.withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
164
165        return this;
166    }
167
168    public ApiRootBuilder addAcceptGZipMiddleware() {
169        builder.addAcceptGZipMiddleware();
170
171        return this;
172    }
173
174    public ApiRootBuilder withErrorMiddleware() {
175        builder.withErrorMiddleware();
176
177        return this;
178    }
179
180    public ApiRootBuilder withErrorMiddleware(final ErrorMiddleware errorMiddleware) {
181        builder.withErrorMiddleware(errorMiddleware);
182
183        return this;
184    }
185
186    public ApiRootBuilder withRetryMiddleware(Supplier<RetryMiddleware> retryMiddleware) {
187        builder.withRetryMiddleware(retryMiddleware);
188
189        return this;
190    }
191
192    public ApiRootBuilder withRetryMiddleware(RetryMiddleware retryMiddleware) {
193        builder.withRetryMiddleware(retryMiddleware);
194
195        return this;
196    }
197
198    public ApiRootBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries) {
199        builder.withRetryMiddleware(maxRetries);
200
201        return this;
202    }
203
204    public ApiRootBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes) {
205        builder.withRetryMiddleware(maxRetries, statusCodes);
206
207        return this;
208    }
209
210    public ApiRootBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware) {
211        builder.withOAuthMiddleware(oAuthMiddleware);
212
213        return this;
214    }
215
216    public ApiRootBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final OAuthMiddleware oAuthMiddleware) {
217        builder.withOAuthMiddleware(oAuthMiddleware);
218
219        return this;
220    }
221
222    public ApiRootBuilder withTokenSupplier(final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
223        builder.withTokenSupplier(tokenSupplier);
224
225        return this;
226    }
227
228    public ApiRootBuilder withInternalLoggerMiddleware(final InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware) {
229        builder.withInternalLoggerMiddleware(internalLoggerMiddleware);
230
231        return this;
232    }
233
234    public ApiRootBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory) {
235        builder.withInternalLoggerFactory(internalLoggerFactory);
236
237        return this;
238    }
239
240    public ApiRootBuilder withApiBaseUrl(String apiBaseUrl) {
241        builder.withApiBaseUrl(apiBaseUrl);
242
243        return this;
244    }
245
246    public ApiRootBuilder withApiBaseUrl(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
247        builder.withApiBaseUrl(apiBaseUrl);
248
249        return this;
250    }
251
252    public ApiRootBuilder withUserAgentSupplier(final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier) {
253        builder.withUserAgentSupplier(userAgentSupplier);
254
255        return this;
256    }
257
258    public ApiRootBuilder addCorrelationIdProvider(final @Nullable CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
259        builder.addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider);
260
261        return this;
262    }
263
264    public ApiRootBuilder withMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
265        builder.withMiddleware(middleware, middlewares);
266
267        return this;
268    }
269
270    public ApiRootBuilder addMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
271        builder.addMiddleware(middleware, middlewares);
272
273        return this;
274    }
275
276    public ApiRootBuilder withMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
277        builder.withMiddlewares(middlewares);
278
279        return this;
280    }
281
282    public ApiRootBuilder addMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
283        builder.addMiddlewares(middlewares);
284
285        return this;
286    }
287
288    public ApiRootBuilder with(UnaryOperator<ClientBuilder> builderUnaryOperator) {
289        builderUnaryOperator.apply(builder);
290
291        return this;
292    }
293
294    public ApiRoot build() {
295        return ApiRoot.fromClient(clientSupplier().get());
296    }
297
298    public ApiHttpClient buildClient() {
299        return clientSupplier().get();
300    }
301
302    public Supplier<ApiHttpClient> clientSupplier() {
303        return builder::build;
304    }
305
306    /**
307     * @deprecated use {@link #build(String)}  instead
308     */
309    @Deprecated
310    public ByProjectKeyRequestBuilder buildForProject(final String projectKey) {
311        return ApiRoot.fromClient(builder.build()).withProjectKey(projectKey);
312    }
313
314    /**
315     * @deprecated use {@link #build(String)}  instead
316     */
317    @Deprecated
318    public ProjectApiRoot buildProjectRoot(final String projectKey) {
319        return ProjectApiRoot.fromClient(projectKey, builder.build());
320    }
321
322    public ProjectApiRoot build(final String projectKey) {
323        return ProjectApiRoot.fromClient(projectKey, builder.build());
324    }
325
326    public static ByProjectKeyRequestBuilder createForProject(final String projectKey,
327            final ApiHttpClient clientSupplier) {
328        return ApiRoot.fromClient(clientSupplier).withProjectKey(projectKey);
329    }
330}
